content.text:
Let me analyze the target image and provide a solution for constructing both structures.

The main image shows two separate structures:

1. Train-like structure (left):
- Blue cube on top
- Yellow cylindrical/rounded block in middle
- Two orange cylindrical blocks as wheels

2. Abstract structure (right):
- Green rectangular block on top
- Blue rectangular block in middle
- Four orange triangular/wedge blocks arranged around the blue block

Let me break down the assembly steps for each structure:

For the Train Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 8 (Place first orange cylinder as front wheel)
    Step2: Move block with index 9 (Place second orange cylinder as back wheel)
    Step3: Move block with index 10 (Place yellow rounded block on top of cylinders)
    Step4: Move block with index 1 (Place blue cube on top of yellow block)
}

For the Abstract Structure:
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1 (Place blue rectangular block as center)
    Step2: Move block with index 4 (Place green rectangular block on top)
    Step3: Move block with index 13 (Place first orange triangular block on left)
    Step4: Move block with index 14 (Place second orange triangular block on right)
    Step5: Move block with index 15 (Place third orange triangular block in front)
    Step6: Move block with index 16 (Place fourth orange triangular block in back)
}

This solution uses the blocks exactly as they appear in the dictionary, maintaining their orientations and colors as shown.
